chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
p: pos n

Goal:
In p (pos_list n)

Premises:
pos_list : forall n : nat, list (pos n)
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Notation pos := Fin.t
Fin.weak : forall p0 : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p0 + ?m) -> pos (p0 + ?n) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> VectorDef.t ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.depair_sanity : forall (o : pos ?m) (p0 : pos ?n), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.depair o p0)) = ?n * proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat o) + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.L : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (?m + n0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (w : VectorDef.t ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p0 : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p0)) = p0 where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
VectorDef.const : ?A -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n)) (P : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : VectorDef.t ?A ?n), P (VectorDef.cons ?A h ?n t)) -> P v where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p0 q : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p0 = q where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.L_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.L n0 p0)) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Init.Nat.add = fix add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S p => S (add p m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.add (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
Fin.caseS' : forall (p0 : pos (S ?n)) (P : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P pos0 -> (forall p1 : pos ?n, P (pos_nxt p1)) -> P p0 where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.R_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.R n0 p0)) = n0 + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
pos_left_right_rect : forall (n m : nat) (P : pos (n + m) -> Type), (forall p : pos n, P (pos_left m p)) -> (forall p : pos m, P (pos_right n p)) -> forall p : pos (n + m), P p
pos_S_invert : forall (n : nat) (P : pos (S n) -> Type), P pos0 -> (forall p : pos n, P (pos_nxt p)) -> forall p : pos (S n), P p
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : pos m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (pos n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, pos m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
in_app_or : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ m) -> In a l \/ In a m
in_or_app : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m)
Fin.of_nat : forall p n : nat, pos n + {exists m : nat, p = n + m}
